targets.rawSql:
-- MONITORING Grafana (Host OS Info)
SELECT
    [host_platform],
    [host_distribution],
    [host_release],
    [host_architecture]
FROM
    [master].[sys].[dm_os_host_info]

-- MONITORING Grafana (TOP X executed Queries details)
SELECT
  TOP 20
  text,
  execution_count AS count,
  creation_time,
  last_execution_time,
  total_rows,
  total_worker_time,
  last_worker_time,
  total_elapsed_time,
  last_elapsed_time,
  min_elapsed_time,
  max_elapsed_time,
  total_used_grant_kb,
  last_used_grant_kb,
  min_used_grant_kb,
  max_used_grant_kb,
  -- Total Used Granted Memory in Kilobytes
  total_grant_kb,
  last_grant_kb,
  min_grant_kb,
  max_grant_kb
FROM
  sys.dm_exec_query_stats AS deqs
  CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(deqs.sql_handle) AS dest
WHERE dest.text NOT LIKE '-- MONITORING%' AND dest.text NOT LIKE '(@%' AND dest.text NOT LIKE '%sp_%' AND dest.text NOT LIKE '%sys%'
ORDER BY
  count DESC;

-- MONITORING Grafana (LAST X executed Queries details)
SELECT
  TOP 20
  text,
  execution_count AS count,
  creation_time,
  last_execution_time,
  total_rows,
  total_worker_time,
  last_worker_time,
  total_elapsed_time,
  last_elapsed_time,
  min_elapsed_time,
  max_elapsed_time,
  total_used_grant_kb,
  last_used_grant_kb,
  min_used_grant_kb,
  max_used_grant_kb,
  -- Total Used Granted Memory in Kilobytes
  total_grant_kb,
  last_grant_kb,
  min_grant_kb,
  max_grant_kb
FROM
  sys.dm_exec_query_stats AS deqs
  CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(deqs.sql_handle) AS dest
WHERE dest.text NOT LIKE '-- MONITORING%' AND dest.text NOT LIKE '(@%' AND dest.text NOT LIKE '%sp_%' AND dest.text NOT LIKE '%sys%'
ORDER BY
  last_execution_time DESC;

-- MONITORING Grafana (LAST X MONITORING Queries details)
SELECT
  TOP 100
  text,
  execution_count AS count,
  creation_time,
  last_execution_time,
  total_rows,
  total_worker_time,
  last_worker_time,
  total_elapsed_time,
  last_elapsed_time,
  min_elapsed_time,
  max_elapsed_time,
  total_used_grant_kb,
  last_used_grant_kb,
  min_used_grant_kb,
  max_used_grant_kb,
  total_grant_kb,
  last_grant_kb,
  min_grant_kb,
  max_grant_kb
FROM
  sys.dm_exec_query_stats AS deqs
  CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(deqs.sql_handle) AS dest
WHERE dest.text LIKE '-- MONITORING%'
ORDER BY last_execution_time DESC;

list.description: Sqlserver datasource based on the instance name (instances in prometeus must be = sqlserver datasources)
list.label: sqlserver
list.name: sqlserver
